name: Nake VS Nake
description:
If you do not have a controller, the controls are like Snake (for the red snake) the green snake will follow inverted inputs.

it is WASD to change direction, click to shoot the magenta circle and collect debris corresponding to the color of the snake to get points. On easy, the gray circle is just a visual aid. 

With either snake, hitting a tail, the magenta/gray circle, or the edges of the game will reset you.

This game was designed to be played on a controller, and operates as a twin stick shooter.
